headline: Collections
pros: There are no positives to speak of and I'd rate lower if I could but I can't do one star.
cons: The president has the temperament of Donald Trump. There is no professionalism within the company and they constantly berate customers over the phone. What they do here is a form of harassment. As any customer review will tell you: profanity, spam phone calls, collateral retaliation for petty comments and account oversight are all things customers can expect from Thrift.

headline: Good Resume booster for new graduates.
pros:
Collections department:
Work environment is laid back.
The work is fairly simple.
Benefits are decent.
Two annual trips paid for by then boss.
cons:
The owner is moody and his mood will affect your work day. 
If you are promoted to the credit department you are on a very short leash.
Turnover is very high.

headline: Good start
pros: A good place to start out at for a resume booster, friendly environment and cool people help make the job easier.
cons: An overbearing boss who breathes down your neck, and makes people often feel uncomfortable. He is however a good guy at heart.

headline: Former Employee
pros: Good people to work with.  you have a lot of fun hanging out with your co-workers all day.  location is accessible from most major highways
cons: awful hours.  way past 5pm every weekday and optional saturdays.  rewards and bonuses are fairly limited. very high turnover.

headline: Terrible place to work.
